CodeChunks.CodeChunk: SpellData data; if (!Core.Me.HasAura(217) && ActionManager.CurrentActions.TryGetValue(210, out data) && ActionManager.CanCast(data, Core.Me)) ActionManager.DoAction(210, Core.Me);
